name: FootballTips
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Are you a football fan, player, or coach who wants to learn more about the game? Coach Williams has you covered! Sign up for Football tips to get a daily dose of Football Tips from a real college football coach. The more you listen to Football Tips, the more NFL coaching decisions, playcalling and team philosophy will make sense to you. As a player, you'll be able to take the actionable tips and apply them to your game. As a coach, you'll be able to take your players to the next level. As a fan, the game will become more clear to you as you watch it on the big screen. Sign up for Football Tips today and become a football aficionado!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
